shortDescription.default: SPFx Adaptive Cards with Microsoft Graph Integration - No Admin Approval Required

longDescription.default: Enhanced Adaptive Card rendering with Microsoft Graph integration for improved user targeting and authentication. Uses delegated permissions that don't require admin approval. Includes embedded JSON loading, improved error handling, dashboard functionality with read tracking, and enhanced user filtering based on Graph API data.

features.title: SPFx Adaptive Cards Solution
features.description: Complete solution with Adaptive Card viewer and Dashboard components
